title: Ticket #5354: HTCondor View: custom queries ("edit")
description:
It should be possible to do custom queries. At the moment you can use the "edit" link that pops up when you hover over the graph or table, but it's awkward and not saved anywhere.

  1. Clicking edit should change the source to "Custom" and disable "Duration"
  2. The query should be stored in the URL (and used on reload to restore state)
